mapper.select: SELECT a.ID as id,a.PROCEDURE_TYPE_NAME as name,a.PARENT_ID as parentId,a.IS_LEAF as isLeaf FROM ${ptTableName} a WHERE a.IS_SEALED=0 AND a.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} UNION ALL SELECT b.ID as id,b.PROCEDURE_NAME as name,b.PROCEDURE_TYPE_ID as parentId,3 as isLeaf FROM ${pTableName} b WHERE b.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId}
